00022 #include "Common/Compat.h"
00023 #include "Common/Logger.h"
00024 #include "Common/Checksum.h"
00025 #include "Common/Serialization.h"
00026 #include "Filesystem.h"

00028 #include "MetaLogReaderDfsBase.h"

00030 using namespace Hypertable;
00031 using namespace Serialization;
00032 
00033 namespace {
00034   const uint32_t READAHEAD_BUFSZ = 1024 * 1024;
00035   const uint32_t OUTSTANDING_READS = 1;
00036 }
00037 
00038 MetaLogReaderDfsBase::MetaLogReaderDfsBase(Filesystem *fs, const String &path) :
00039     m_fs(fs), m_path(path), m_cur(0) {
00040   if (fs) {
00041     m_file_size = fs->length(path);
00042     m_fd = fs->open_buffered(path, READAHEAD_BUFSZ, OUTSTANDING_READS);
00043   }
00044 }
00045 
00046 MetaLogReader::ScanEntry *
00047 MetaLogReaderDfsBase::next(ScanEntry &entry) {
00048   if (m_cur >= m_file_size)
00049     return 0;
00050 
00051   try {
00052     uint8_t buf[ML_ENTRY_HEADER_SIZE];
00053     const uint8_t *p = buf;
00054     size_t nread = m_fs->read(m_fd, buf, ML_ENTRY_HEADER_SIZE);
00055     m_cur += nread;
00056 
00057     if (nread != ML_ENTRY_HEADER_SIZE)
00058       HT_THROW(Error::METALOG_ENTRY_TRUNCATED, "reading header");
00059 
00060     HT_TRY("decoding scan entry",
00061       entry.checksum = decode_i32(&p, &nread);
00062       entry.timestamp = decode_i64(&p, &nread);
00063       entry.type = decode_i8(&p, &nread);
00064       entry.payload_size = decode_i32(&p, &nread));
00065 
00066     entry.buf.clear();
00067     entry.buf.reserve(entry.payload_size);
00068     nread = m_fs->read(m_fd, entry.buf.ptr, entry.payload_size);
00069     m_cur += nread;
00070     entry.buf.ptr += nread;
00071 
00072     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"checksum="<< entry.checksum <<" timestamp="
00073         << entry.timestamp <<" type="<< entry.type <<" payload="
00074         << entry.payload_size << HT_END;
00075 
00076     if (nread != entry.payload_size)
00077       HT_THROW(Error::METALOG_ENTRY_TRUNCATED, "reading payload");
00078 
00079     // checksum include timestamp, type, payload size and payload data
00080     uint32_t checksum = crc32(buf + 4, ML_ENTRY_HEADER_SIZE - 4);
00081     checksum = crc32_update(checksum, entry.buf.base, entry.payload_size);
00082 
00083     if (entry.checksum != checksum)
00084       HT_THROWF(Error::METALOG_CHECKSUM_MISMATCH, "type=%d expected %x, got %x",
00085                 entry.type, entry.checksum, checksum);
00086 
00087     return &entry;
00088   }
00089   catch (Exception &e) {
00090     HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Error reading metalog: %s: read %lu/%lu",
00091                m_path.c_str(), m_cur, m_file_size);
00092   }
00093 }
